Title: Authorizes the Power House Church to file an application for a real property tax exemption with the county of Nassau assessor
Summary: Authorizes the Power House Church to file an application for a real property tax exemption with the county of Nassau assessor for all applicable taxes from the 2022, 2023 and 2024 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the Power House Church to file an application for a retroactive real property tax exemption with the county of Nassau assessor
